metadata.title: CVE-2015-6614 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Telephony in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY48X allows attackers to gainprivileges, and consequently bypass intended network-interfacerestrictions, perform expensive data transfers, or cause a denial ofservice (call-reception outage or mute manipulation), via a craftedapplication, aka internal bug 21900139.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
